W

Weapon - Class in io.mrshannon.hexmek.models
Represents a weapon that can be stored in a component of a unit.
Weapon(String, WeaponRange, LineOfSightStrategy, FiringStrategy) - Constructor for class io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.Weapon
Construct a new weapon, given its type and various specifications and strategies.
WeaponFactory - Class in io.mrshannon.hexmek.models
A factory for the Weapon class that uses the Flyweight pattern to allow many of the same type of weapons to be made cheaply.
WeaponRange - Class in io.mrshannon.hexmek.models
Weapon range specification and range modifier calculations.
WeaponRange(int, int, int) - Constructor for class io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.WeaponRange
Construct a weapon range for a weapon without a minimum range.
WeaponRange(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.WeaponRange
Construct a weapon range for a weapon with a minimum range.
